snippet: The Miami City Ballet and Edward Villella, its artistic director, announced on Tuesday that he would leave immediately instead of next April. The development was the latest turn in the long and painful separation between the company and Mr. Villella.
abstract: The Miami City Ballet and Edward Villella, its artistic director, announced on Tuesday that he would leave immediately instead of next April. The development was the latest turn in the long and painful separation between the company and Mr. Villella.

headline.main: Edward Villella Departs Miami City Ballet Early
headline.print_headline: Miami Ballet’s Leader Makes an Early Exit
